description:
Elon Musk has dropped his lawsuit against OpenAI, the company he co-founded in 2015. Court filings from the Superior Court of California reveal that Musk called off the legal action on June 11th, just a day before an informal conference was scheduled to discuss the discovery process. Musk had initially sued OpenAI in March 2024,... Read more »

The post Musk ends OpenAI lawsuit while slamming Apple’s ChatGPT plans appeared first on AI News.
title: Musk ends OpenAI lawsuit while slamming Apple’s ChatGPT plans
